GSD.description:
ALSA: timer: Use deferred fasync helper

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 2dffd9478f76f843205443cabfe04875b9a05b34. For more details please see the references link.
